body_html:
Hi @kmonachopoulos ,

We are working on putting together weight and activation quantization for TensorFlow Lite (that doesn't require training), will keep you posted once that is ready.

In the meantime can you inspect the inputs of the culprit "Reshape/shape" (looks like it is a Pack node) node before and after you call the transformation to see what exactly is changing. This may give you some hints as to what is going wrong with the shapes.

body:
Hi @kmonachopoulos ,

We are working on putting together weight and activation quantization for TensorFlow Lite (that doesn't require training), will keep you posted once that is ready.

In the meantime can you inspect the inputs of the culprit "Reshape/shape" (looks like it is a Pack node) node before and after you call the transformation to see what exactly is changing. This may give you some hints as to what is going wrong with the shapes.
